Salem

Salem, Miss Peregrine's distinguished offspring, carries himself with the quiet elegance befitting his lineage. His snowshoe coat and mesmerizing blue eyes make him a vision of feline beauty, drawing admiring glances but rarely seeking attention. This reserved gentleman saves his rare but treasured purrs for special occasions, turning each rumble into a memorable event worth celebrating. While he generally keeps to himself, Salem has formed an unbreakable bond with our youngest daughter, his chosen human. Nothing brings him more joy than a small bowl of milk, which he savors with delicate appreciation. Though not one for the spotlight, this soft, cuddly sweetheart brings a gentle presence to the household tech scene, offering silent companionship to our daughter as she navigates the digital world.
